channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Notebook
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Notebook

item.title: CVE-2022-3742|2024-10-09T19:17:23.103Z -- lenovo -- notebook
item.description: A potential vulnerability was discovered in LCFC BIOS for some Lenovo consumer notebook models that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code due to improper buffer validation.
